detectors.description:

detectors.description:
SafeMath.add(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BETH__1.sol#5-7) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool,string)((z = x + y) >= x,ds-math-add-overflow) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BETH__1.sol#6)
